alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:31PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike, east central Polk and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 931 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Athens, or over Umpire, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Glenwood... Norman... Mimosa... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Mauldin... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Black Springs... Salem in Pike County... Lodi... Langley... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Fancyhill... Roaring Branch Natural Area... Hopper... Caddo Gap... New Hope in Pike County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
